name: Mad Climber Hill Racing
description:
One of the most addictive and crazy physics-based mountain top game. In mad hill climb is all about handling freak monster trucks mixed with beasts. Fun uphill racing in HD edition.

Features:
- more than 20 vehicles mixed with beasts
- car upgrades like tire, suspension, engine, and rotation
- all vehicle types from monster trucks, pickup or minivan
- over 10 best maps (alien planet, volcano or countryside)

A climbing game with many freak vehicles mixed with monsters trying to get up the hilltop. Car upgrade available. Try to max tire, engine, suspension, and rotation on each. Unlock new highland from the peaceful countryside, the dangerous volcano, frozen arctic and unpredictable alien planet. All of these and much more just waiting for the best climber like you.

Show your skill and climb higher and higher! Uphill racing designed for more demanding and interesting players.

Download for free mountain climbing game!

Best climbing game waiting for you!
